T02D2865:201a-1: shr'i badzra p'a ni s'a dha nam /
T02D2865:201a-3: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D2865:201a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2865:201a-5: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po dpal
T02D2865:201a-6: phyag na rdo rje ye shes kyi sku can la
T02D2865:201b-0: phyag 'tshal lo// @201b de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje mnyes par 'dod pas /
T02D2865:201b-2: rig sngags thams cad grub pa'i rgyud dam tshig gi
T02D2865:201b-3: gnas rnams srog gi phyir yang mi gtang bar bsrung
T02D2865:201b-4: bar bya ste / de la dam tshig ni 'di dag go //
T02D2865:201b-5: dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems /
T02D2865:201b-6: sngags dang phyag rgya slob dpon dag / srog gi phyir yang mi gtang ste //
T02D2865:201b-7: de dag mchod cing rim gror bya //
T02D2865:201b-8: sangs rgyas bstan la zhugs pa yis //
T02D2865:201b-9: dge slong rnams la gus bya zhing //
T02D2865:201b-10: lha dang bla ma la mi khro //
T02D2865:201b-11: 'jig rten lha sogs mi smad do //
T02D2865:201b-12: sems can rnams la byams pa dang //
T02D2865:201b-13: snying rje chen po bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2865:201b-14: de yi gnod pa bsal bya zhing //
T02D2865:201b-15: bdag la gnod byas bzod par bya //
T02D2865:201b-16: ser sna ring du bsal nas ni //
T02D2865:201b-17: sbyin pas sems can phan gdags so //
T02D2865:201b-18: dam tshig med par gyur pa la //
T02D2865:201b-19: sngags dang phyag rgya sbyin mi bya //
T02D2865:201b-20: chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing //
T02D2865:201b-21: mdor na bdag dang gzhan rnams la //
T02D2865:201b-22: phan pa 'ba' zhig lhur bya zhing //
T02D2865:201b-23: khri la nyal bar mi bya'o //
T02D2865:201b-24: de ltar dam tshig bsrung ba la 'bad pas dang
T02D2865:201b-25: por mal nas tsog pur 'dug la chos nyid rnam
T02D2865:201b-26: par dag pa'i sngags lan gsum mam /
T02D2865:201b-28: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe sarba dharmma te badzra sa tva h'um /
T02D2865:201b-29: de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2865:201b-30: dpal phyag na rdo rje mdun du dmigs la phyag bya ste /
T02D2865:201b-32: 'phags pa thams cad kyis thugs rjes gzigs te /
T02D2865:201b-33: mgon ma mchis pa dag myur du sangs rgyas grub par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2865:201b-34: de nas khro bo mnol ba med pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas snying ga dang /
T02D2865:201b-35: lkog ma dang smin mtshams dang spyi bo dang /
T02D2865:201b-36: gnas bzhir bzhag ste bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2865:201b-37: de nas phyi rol sa la sogs par 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2865:201b-38: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcas la mthe dod
T02D2865:201b-39: bsgreng pa ni khro bo mnol ba med pa'i phyag
T02D2865:201b-40: rgya ste sngags aom badzra kro dh'a na h'um dza:
T02D2865:201b-41: phyi rol sa la sogs par 'gro ba'i tshe bdud
T02D2865:201b-42: rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags 'di bar chad med par
T02D2865:201b-43: lan bdun bzlas na de'i tshe bag med par spyad
T02D2865:201b-44: kyang bgegs rnams kyis mi brdzi'o zhes lung nas 'byung
T02D2865:202a-2: na mor tna tra y'a ya /
T02D2865:202a-3: na mashcanda badzra ph'a na ye /
T02D2865:202a-4: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2865:202a-5: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02D2865:202a-6: damshtrota ka ta bhee r'a ya /
T02D2865:202a-7: aa si mu sa la dha r'a ya /
T02D2865:202a-8: p'a ra shu p'a sha hast'a ya /
T02D2865:202a-10: aom aa mri ta kunda li /
T02D2865:202a-18: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02D2865:202a-19: sarba bighn'am bi n'a ya k'a n'am /
T02D2865:202a-20: ma h'a gan pa ti dz'i bi t'am ta ka r'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:202a-21: phyi rol nas slar log pa dang kha lag bkrus te nye reg bya'o //
T02D2865:202a-22: lag pa g-yas pa'i thal mo bkan la gung mo
T02D2865:202a-23: dang srin lag yid tsam bkug pa'i bar du chu
T02D2865:202a-24: blugs la sngags 'dis btab la mgo dang lus kun
T02D2865:202a-25: la gtor la lhag ma rnams btung ngo //
T02D2865:202a-26: aom shuddhe na tu sho dha na sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:202a-27: de nas rgyud dang mthun pa'i gnas yid du 'ong
T02D2865:202a-28: bar khrus byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung ste
T02D2865:202a-29: / nyes pa med de tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms pas sems kyi rgyud sbyangs la /
T02D2865:202a-30: 'gro ba mtha' dag gdon par yid la 'dus pas sku gzugs la sogs pa'i spyan snga'am /
T02D2865:202a-32: phyag btsal ba dang mchod pa bshams pa dang byang
T02D2865:202a-33: chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs te rim bzhin
T02D2865:202a-34: byas nas / theg pa mchog las mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir skyil mo krung bcas te /
T02D2865:202a-35: dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i phyir dam tshig gsum
T02D2865:202a-36: gyi phyag rgyal sogs pas byin gyis brlab pa cho
T02D2865:202a-38: de la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya thal mo sbyar la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2865:202a-39: phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te //
T02D2865:202a-40: sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyi yin //
T02D2865:202a-41: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni //
T02D2865:202a-42: phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas //
T02D2865:202a-45: aa sa me tri sa me ma h'a sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:202a-46: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag rnam
T02D2865:202a-47: par dag par bya ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi
T02D2865:202a-48: khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug
T02D2865:202a-49: la / mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ngo //
T02D2865:202a-50: phyag rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D2865:202a-51: chos dbyings rnam par sbyong ba'o //
T02D2865:202a-54: dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham /
T02D2865:202a-55: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni lag pa gnyis sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la /
T02D2865:202b-0: mthe bong gnyis @202b lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du gzhug go //
T02D2865:202b-1: rgyal mchog dpal dang ldan pa yi //
T02D2865:202b-2: chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba yi //
T02D2865:202b-3: 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yis //
T02D2865:202b-6: na ma:sa manta badzr'a n'am badzra a'atma konyaham /
T02D2865:202b-7: yi ge ram dkar po yang spyi bor bsam mo //
T02D2865:202b-8: de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya dang sngags
T02D2865:202b-9: kyis gnas lngar gtugs na go gyon par 'gyur ro
T02D2865:202b-10: // de'i phyag rgya la thal mo sbyar la mdzub
T02D2865:202b-11: mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar mthe bong gnyis
T02D2865:202b-16: de nas bgegs thams cad rnam par sel ba mi
T02D2865:202b-17: bzad pa'i rig sngags chen mo rjes su 'brang bar
T02D2865:202b-18: bya ba'i phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar la mdzub
T02D2865:202b-19: mo gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug gung mo gnyis
T02D2865:202b-20: rtse sprad srin lag gnyis brkyang mthe'u chung gnyis cung
T02D2865:202b-21: zad dgug pa ni srung ba chen mo'i phyag rgya
T02D2865:202b-23: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo: sarba bha ya
T02D2865:202b-24: bi ga te bhyo bi shva mu khe bhya:sarba th'a
T02D2865:202b-25: ham kham raksha ma h'a ba le /
T02D2865:202b-26: sarba ta th'a ga ta pu ne nir dza te /
T02D2865:202b-27: h'um h'um tra ta tra ta /
T02D2865:202b-28: aa pra ti ha te sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:202b-29: bgegs dang mi bzad nad thams cad //
T02D2865:202b-30: srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rnams //
T02D2865:202b-31: 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D2865:202b-32: de dag thams cad 'byer bar byed //
T02D2865:202b-33: de nas yon chab kyi snod chu gtsang ma dang
T02D2865:202b-34: dri chu dang me tog bzang pos bkang la chos
T02D2865:202b-35: kyi dbyings kyi yi ge dang /
T02D2865:202b-36: rigs kyi snying po dang 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sngags kyis btab ste /
T02D2865:202b-38: bsang gtor dang mchod pa'i yo byad gzhag go /
T02D2865:202b-39: de dag kun yang bsang ba dang sbyang ba'i phyir
T02D2865:202b-41: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis gdab po //
T02D2865:202b-42: de nas bskrad pa dang mtshams bcad pa dag byas te bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2865:202b-43: bskrad pa dang mtshams bcad pa yang de dag nyid kyis bya'o //
T02D2865:202b-44: chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ram //
T02D2865:202b-45: rigs kyi snying po badzra dhrika / mi g-yo ba'i
T02D2865:202b-46: phyag rgya ni lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs
T02D2865:202b-47: la mdzub mo dad gung mo gnyis brkyang la /
T02D2865:202b-48: srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo mthe
T02D2865:202b-49: bos mnan la lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin
T02D2865:202b-50: du byas te mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis g-yon
T02D2865:203a-1: mgon po'i ral gri shubs su bcug pa ste /
T02D2865:203a-2: bskrad pa'i tshe ral gri shubs nas phyung nas g-yon nas bskor /
T02D2865:203a-3: mtshams bcad pa'i tshe g-yas nas bskor sngags la /
T02D2865:203a-4: na ma:sa manta badzra n'am aa tsa la k'a na
T02D2865:203a-5: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na spho ta spho ta
T02D2865:203a-6: ya h'um / tra da ham mam lan gsum bya'o //
T02D2865:203a-7: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgya thal
T02D2865:203a-8: mo sbyar nas gung mo gnyis rtse sprad de brkyang
T02D2865:203a-9: mthe'u chung bsnol te nad du bcug pa'i nang du
T02D2865:203a-10: srin lag gnyis bzhag pa'i rtse mo mthe bong gnyis
T02D2865:203a-11: kyis mnan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i phyi rol
T02D2865:203a-12: nas rgur por byas te nas gang tsam ma reg
T02D2865:203a-13: par bya'o // bdud rtsi thab sbyor phyag rgya rtse
T02D2865:203a-14: gsum pa las thams cad pa ste las kun la
T02D2865:203a-15: par bya'o // 'di sbyar ro // sngags ni aom aa mri te h'um phat /
T02D2865:203a-16: yang na sngar gyi sngags mang pos sbyar ro //
T02D2865:203a-17: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du
T02D2865:203a-18: 'dug la snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi
T02D2865:203a-19: ge bsams te / de las chos thams cad tshig
T02D2865:203a-20: gi lam dang bral lo zhes sgra byung nas dngos
T02D2865:203a-21: po thams cad stong par bsgom /
T02D2865:203a-22: de las 'od zer spro pa dang bsdu ba'i rim
T02D2865:203a-23: gyis bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D2865:203a-24: sku re ba thams cad yongs su skor bar byed
T02D2865:203a-25: pa / mdog me tog pri yang ku ltar ljong ser ram /
T02D2865:203a-26: yang na rin po che markata ltar ljang sngon phyag
T02D2865:203a-27: gnyis pa dbu rgyan can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
T02D2865:203a-30: dar tshig gu bsnams pa 'od zer gyis bskor ba
T02D2865:203a-31: gzi brjid dang ldan pa phyag na ye shes kyi
T02D2865:203a-32: rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams par bsgom mo //
T02D2865:203a-33: chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ger dkar po yang spyi bor bsam mo //
T02D2865:203a-34: mig gnyis su tr'am dmar po gzhag ste /
T02D2865:203a-35: byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o //
T02D2865:203a-36: de nas brtan par bya ba'i phyir de nyid kyi phyag rgya bcings te gnas lngar gtug go //
T02D2865:203a-37: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng /
T02D2865:203a-38: mdzub mo gnyis bkug la ngos gnyis su bzhag la rdo rje ltar bya'o //
T02D2865:203a-39: mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis gzhibs te bsgrengs
T02D2865:203a-40: la bzhag srin lag gnyis lag pa'i nang du gzhug
T02D2865:203a-41: go // phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgya //
T02D2865:203a-42: mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa ste //
T02D2865:203b-0: sangs rgyas @203b rnams kyi ye shes 'di //
T02D2865:203b-1: nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs te bstan //
T02D2865:203b-2: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2865:203b-5: na ma:sa mantra badzra n'am tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um /
T02D2865:203b-6: de nas yan lag rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gtsug
T02D2865:203b-7: tor gyi phyag rgya bcings la spyi gtsug tu gzhag
T02D2865:203b-8: go // lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings la gung
T02D2865:203b-9: mo gzhibs te bsgreng mdzub mo gnyis ngos nas bkug
T02D2865:203b-10: go // ste sbyar ro // gtsug tor phyag rgya rgya chen te //
T02D2865:203b-11: gtsug tor zhes ni grags pa yin //
T02D2865:203b-12: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D2865:203b-13: rgyal ba'i mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02D2865:203b-15: na ma:sa manta badzr'a n'am h'um h'um /
T02D2865:203b-16: de nas ye shes kyi spyan bsgrub bo //
T02D2865:203b-17: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo
T02D2865:203b-18: srin lag brkyang mthe bong gi drung du bzhag go
T02D2865:203b-19: /'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyi //
T02D2865:203b-20: ye shes las byung spyan yin te //
T02D2865:203b-21: mig gi steng du mkhas pas gzhag / de las ye shes spyan du gyur //
T02D2865:203b-24: ga ga na spha ra na ksha na /
T02D2865:203b-25: ka ru ma h'a ta th'a ga ta tsakshu sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:203b-26: de nas yum gyi phyag rgya bcings la gnas lngar gtug go //
T02D2865:203b-27: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis
T02D2865:203b-28: gzhibs te bsgreng mdzub mo gung mo'i phyi rol nas
T02D2865:203b-29: bkug la bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par
T02D2865:203b-30: bya / mthe bong gnyis srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug go //
T02D2865:203b-31: 'di ni yum m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgya ste rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D2865:203b-33: na ma:sa manta badzr'a n'am dri dha tishtha tishtha dza yan te sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:203b-34: de'i 'og tu rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D2865:203b-35: la go bgo ste phyag rgya dang sngags gong du
T02D2865:203b-36: bstan no // de nas mdun du gzhal med khang bsams te /
T02D2865:203b-37: de'i rim pa yang dang por chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D2865:203b-38: yi ge ram gyis gnas kun stong pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2865:203b-39: gyis rnam par dag par bsams la de'i 'og tu
T02D2865:203b-40: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'khor du yi ge aa gser
T02D2865:203b-41: gyi mdog can las gser gyi sa gzhi gru bzhi
T02D2865:203b-42: rdo rje'i rang bzhin can rdo rjes mtshan pa rgya
T02D2865:203b-43: dang khyon dpag tu med par bsam mo //
T02D2865:203b-44: de'i steng du padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i
T02D2865:203b-45: steng du yi ge bam mdog dkar po gangs dang
T02D2865:203b-46: shel lta bur dangs shing gsal ba las chu'i rgyun
T02D2865:203b-47: 'o ma dang mu tig gi 'bru lta bu yan
T02D2865:204a-2: gser gyi sa gzhi bkang ste dpag tu med pa'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2865:204a-3: de'i nang nas yi ge lam las ri rab chen
T02D2865:204a-4: po sna bzhi las grub pa gru bzhi pa rgya
T02D2865:204a-5: dang khyon dpag tu med par byung ba'i steng du
T02D2865:204a-6: rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang brtsegs
T02D2865:204a-7: ma'i nang na padma dang seng ge'i gdan chen po
T02D2865:204a-8: padma'i gdan mang pos bskor bar bsams te /
T02D2865:204a-9: de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du gyur par sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2865:204a-10: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2865:204a-11: aom aa na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo
T02D2865:204a-12: bi shva mu khe bhya:sarba th'a kham aungga te spha
T02D2865:204a-13: ra na hi mam ga ga na kham sv'a h'a
T02D2865:204a-14: / 'di ltar de dag thams cad de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2865:204a-15: yang na nam mkha' mdzod kyis kyang de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2865:204a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D2865:204a-17: nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas mthe
T02D2865:204a-18: bo gnyis nang du g-yab cing sngags 'dis rang gi
T02D2865:204a-19: pho brang nas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2865:204a-21: ae hye hi bha ga w'an ma h'a k'a ru
T02D2865:204a-22: n'i ka badzra p'a ni sa pa ri w'a ra
T02D2865:204a-24: de nas gshegs te mdun gyi nam mkha' la dmigs
T02D2865:204a-25: la sngar bstan pa'i dam tshig gsum gyi sngags dang
T02D2865:204a-26: phyag rgya dang / rang gi phyag rgya dang yum
T02D2865:204a-27: gyi phyag rgya rnams bstan te so so'i sngags brjod
T02D2865:204a-28: phyag rgya dang / do // de nas dam tshig can du gzigs pas mnyes par bya ste /
T02D2865:204a-29: gzhan la phan 'dogs par bzhed pas sngags pa ji
T02D2865:204a-30: srid 'dod ba de srid du byin gyis brlab po
T02D2865:204a-31: // de nas 'phags pa mi g-yo mgon nam bdud
T02D2865:204a-32: rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas snga na
T02D2865:204a-33: // gnas pa dang / phyi nas 'brang ba'i bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2865:204a-34: de nas gzhal med khang gi nang du gshegs par
T02D2865:204a-35: bya ba'i phyir mchod yon sngags kyis btab pa blangs
T02D2865:204a-36: la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mchod yon spreng zhing
T02D2865:204a-37: nang du byon par bsam mo //
T02D2865:204a-38: bdag gi dad dang dam tshig gis //
T02D2865:204a-39: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2865:204a-40: bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang //
T02D2865:204a-41: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2865:204a-42: de nas byon te dbus kyi padma dang seng ge'i
T02D2865:204a-43: gdan la dpal phyag na rdo rje dang 'khor gyi
T02D2865:204a-44: padma'i gdan rnams la gsang sngags dang khro bo la
T02D2865:204b-0: sogs pa dpal phyag na @204b rdo rje'i zhabs 'bring
T02D2865:204b-1: gi 'phags pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D2865:204b-2: de nas mchod yon gyi snod du spos gtsang ma blugs la zhal dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2865:204b-4: aom pra wa ra satk'a ra prat'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:204b-5: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug par bya'o //
T02D2865:204b-6: 'phags pa'i pho brang gi phyi rol du 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i 'am /
T02D2865:204b-7: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas mtshams bcad do //
T02D2865:204b-8: de nas 'phags pa'i tshogs la phyag bya ste /
T02D2865:204b-9: tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do //
T02D2865:204b-10: mchod pa rnams rim pa bzhin du dbul /
T02D2865:204b-11: bcom ldan thugs rjes byon pa legs //
T02D2865:204b-12: bdag ni bsod nams skal bar ldan //
T02D2865:204b-13: bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang //
T02D2865:204b-14: thugs rjes thugs dpag mdzad du gsol //
T02D2865:204b-15: zhes dang por mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2865:204b-17: aom sarba de ba ta th'a aa tsita aa mri ta da r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:204b-19: gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi //
T02D2865:204b-20: lha rdzas dam pa'i dri mchog dag / bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi //
T02D2865:204b-21: bzhes nas bdag la dges par mdzod //
T02D2865:204b-22: a'a ha ra a'a ha ra bha ga b'a na sarba bidy'a ra p'u dzita sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:204b-23: zhes sngags 'di tshigs bcad kun gyi mjug la brjod /
T02D2865:204b-24: de nas me tog dbul te /
T02D2865:204b-25: gtsang zhing gtsang mar skyes pa yi //
T02D2865:204b-26: lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'di //
T02D2865:204b-27: bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi //
T02D2865:204b-28: bzhes nas bdag la dges par mdzod //
T02D2865:204b-29: de nas bdug spos dbul te /
T02D2865:204b-30: nags tshal bcud ldan yi gar 'ong //
T02D2865:204b-31: dri zhim rgyas pa'i bdug pa'i mchog / bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi //
T02D2865:204b-32: bzhes nas bdag la dges par mdzod //
T02D2865:204b-34: sman rnams bcud gtsang yi gar 'ong //
T02D2865:204b-35: sngags kyi zhal zas bshos 'de dag / bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi //
T02D2865:204b-36: bzhes nas bdag la dges par mdzod //
T02D2865:204b-38: gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis pa //
T02D2865:204b-39: dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba //
T02D2865:204b-40: bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi //
T02D2865:204b-41: bzhes nas bdag la dges par mdzod //
T02D2865:204b-42: a'a lo ke sarba bidy'a dha ra p'u dzi ta h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:204b-43: dri la sogs pa dngos su ma 'byor na yang /
T02D2865:205a-0: de dag gi phyag rgya bcings la yid kyis @205a * //
T02D2865:205a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02D2865:205a-2: de la mchod yon gyi phyag rgya ni thal mo
T02D2865:205a-3: bkan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs gsum par
T02D2865:205a-4: sbyar la srin lag gnyis dbus su bkug la mthe
T02D2865:205a-5: bong gnyis glor sgyur ba 'di ni bdud rtsi rgyun
T02D2865:205a-6: gyi phyag rgya ste mchod yon gyis sbyar ro //
T02D2865:205a-7: dri'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya bya ste /
T02D2865:205a-8: lag pa g-yon pas g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma nas bzung ba'o //
T02D2865:205a-9: me tog gi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis sor
T02D2865:205a-10: mo phan tshun bsnol la lag pa'i nang du bcug
T02D2865:205a-11: la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo gcig tu sbyar la
T02D2865:205a-12: gdu bu'i tshul du byas la mthe bong glor gzhag
T02D2865:205a-14: bdug spos kyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis kyi
T02D2865:205a-15: mthe'u chung dang srin lag dang gung mo'i sor mo
T02D2865:205a-16: rnams phan tshun du rgyab tu sbyar te so so'i
T02D2865:205a-17: sor mo'i drung du bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs
T02D2865:205a-18: te bsgreng / mthe bo gnyis glor gzhag go //
T02D2865:205a-19: lha bshos kyi phyag rgya ni bzed pa'i thal mo las mdzub mo cung zad bkug pa'o //
T02D2865:205a-20: mar me'i phyag rgya ni mthe bong dang gung mo'i
T02D2865:205a-21: sor mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar te gtod la lhag
T02D2865:205a-22: ma rnams khu tshur du bya'o //
T02D2865:205a-24: na ma: sa manta bu ddh'a n'am ga gnas ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:205a-26: na ma: sa man bu ddh'a n'am /
T02D2865:205a-27: bi shuddh'a ga na dho tbha b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:205a-30: ma h'a mu tra mungga te sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:205a-33: dha rma dh'a tu mungga te sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:205a-35: na ma:sa manta ga te p'u dza nas ma ye h'um /
T02D2865:205a-38: ta th'a ga ta aa tsi sphar na aa ba bha sa ga ga me dar ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:205a-39: 'di dag kyang mchod pa tsam du zad de /
T02D2865:205a-40: bdag gi nus pa dang 'jig rten na bsngags pa'i
T02D2865:205a-41: mchod pa rgya chen po gzhan dag kyang ci 'byor
T02D2865:205a-42: pa dbul lo // de nas mchod pa spyi'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2865:205a-43: sems rab tu dang ba'i sgo nas yid kyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas te /
T02D2865:205a-44: de'i thabs kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang /
T02D2865:205a-45: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu dang /
T02D2865:205a-46: bdag gi bsod nams dang ye shes dang smon lam
T02D2865:205a-47: gyi mthu dang dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab
T02D2865:205b-0: pa'i @205b mchod pa chen po'i sprin chen po dang
T02D2865:205b-2: bstod pa sna tshogs pa rnams 'phags pa thams cad
T02D2865:205b-3: kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'byung zhing de bzhin
T02D2865:205b-4: gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur
T02D2865:205b-5: cig ces bsam zhing tshig tu brjod la /
T02D2865:205b-6: mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'byung bar byed pa'i rig sngags 'di lan gsum brjod do //
T02D2865:205b-7: mchod pa spyi'i phyag rgya ni lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar la spyi bor gzhag go //
T02D2865:205b-9: na ma: sa manta bu ddh'a n'am /
T02D2865:205b-10: aa bhi sa ma ye sphar na hi mam ga ga na kham /
T02D2865:205b-11: dharma dh'a tu a'a k'a sha sa manta mam /
T02D2865:205b-12: sarba ta th'a ga ta pa ri shuddha mandal la /
T02D2865:205b-13: ma ma pri ni dhi pu nya dzny'a na ba len dha /
T02D2865:205b-14: sa rba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi shth'a na ba len tsa sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:205b-15: de ltar mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'phags pa thams
T02D2865:205b-16: cad kyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin du gnas par
T02D2865:205b-18: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D2865:205b-19: de nas rdo rje dril bu lag tu blangs la dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa 'dis bstod do //
T02D2865:205b-20: dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa //
T02D2865:205b-21: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis //
T02D2865:205b-22: rdo rje mchog gi lam ston pa //
T02D2865:205b-23: rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2865:205b-24: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang zhing //
T02D2865:205b-25: theg mchog rtogs par thugs su chud //
T02D2865:205b-26: gsang sngags rgyal po gsang 'dzin pa //
T02D2865:205b-27: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2865:205b-28: stobs po cha la drag shul che //
T02D2865:205b-29: rig sngags rgyal po dge ba po //
T02D2865:205b-30: gdul dka' ba dag 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D2865:205b-31: rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2865:205b-32: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2865:205b-33: sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2865:205b-34: 'di skad du 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po //
T02D2865:205b-35: bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D2865:205b-36: dpa'i thams cad la skyabs su mchis kyis bdag la
T02D2865:205b-38: 'gro ba ma lus pa bskyab pa'i mthu bdag la stsol cig ces brjod do //
T02D2865:205b-39: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar bya ste /
T02D2865:205b-40: 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i zhing rab 'byams thams
T02D2865:205b-41: cad du sems can gyi don mdzad pa kha dog
T02D2865:205b-42: dang tshul dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D2865:206a-0: su ldan pa kun du bzang po'i sprul @206a *
T02D2865:206a-1: dang tshul dang / // pa mang po rab tu
T02D2865:206a-2: 'byung bar gyur cig / des kyang sems can thams
T02D2865:206a-3: cad kyi phyi nang gi gdon thams cad rab tu
T02D2865:206a-4: zhi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab
T02D2865:206a-5: tu bsngags la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2865:206a-6: pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang de dag
T02D2865:206a-7: gis thob par gyur cig par bsams nas byin gyis
T02D2865:206a-8: brlab pa gsum gyis byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2865:206a-9: sems can gyi don byin gyis rlob pa'i rig sngags
T02D2865:206a-10: nam mkha' mdzod du byung bar mdzad pa 'di lan
T02D2865:206a-11: gsum brjod do // na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02D2865:206a-12: bi shva mu khe bhya:sarba th'a kham aungga te spha
T02D2865:206a-13: ra na hi mam ga ga na kham sv'a h'a
T02D2865:206a-14: / 'dis lan gsum bzlas pas ji ltar bsams pa'i
T02D2865:206a-15: don rnams sems can gyi khams rnams su de bzhin
T02D2865:206a-16: du 'gyur bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2865:206a-17: rnams kyis mkhyen gyi gzhan shes rab chung ba rnams
T02D2865:206a-18: kyis mi shes so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D2865:206a-19: / so // de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis yid ches par bya'o //
T02D2865:206a-20: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bya
T02D2865:206a-21: zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas pa des
T02D2865:206a-22: bdag gi lha'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi yi ge
T02D2865:206a-23: bkod pa la sogs pas bdag nyid lha'i skur bsgyur
T02D2865:206a-24: la yi ge kham dkar po de'i spyi bor gzhag
T02D2865:206a-25: ste mdun du lha bzhugs pa'i thugs kar bzlas pa
T02D2865:206a-26: bya ba'i yi ge phreng ba bkod la dbugs dang
T02D2865:206a-27: dran pa rab tu bsdams nas slar sdud pa'i tshig
T02D2865:206a-28: gis non par yid la shib bur mi drag mi
T02D2865:206a-29: dal zhing mi skyo bar ji tsam 'dod pa'i bar
T02D2865:206a-31: bzlas kar nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2865:206a-32: te bdag dang lha'i thugs kar bzung la de nas
T02D2865:206a-33: nor bu lag pa g-yas pas blangs nas snyim par
T02D2865:206a-34: bcug la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas te
T02D2865:206a-35: / de'i 'og tu yang yum bzlas snying ga'i thad
T02D2865:206a-36: kar bzung la bzlas pa re la nor bu re
T02D2865:206a-37: re bgrang zhing mgo mjug tu phyag bya'o//
T02D2865:206a-38: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um /
T02D2865:206a-39: ji skad bstan pa bzhin ma nus na yang sangs
T02D2865:206a-40: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
T02D2865:206a-41: 'tshal bar dmigs te sems can gyi don phun sum
T02D2865:206a-42: tshogs par 'gyur bar dmigs shing bzlas so //
T02D2865:206b-0: de nas ngal lam gtong bar @206b 'dod na bzlas
T02D2865:206b-1: pa gtad de bzlas pa rnams yid kyis dpal phyag
T02D2865:206b-2: na rdo rje la gtams pa'i tshul gyis phul la
T02D2865:206b-3: las kyi rdo rje sems dpar bsgyur te 'phags pa
T02D2865:206b-4: rnams la mchod pa ji skad bstan pa bzhin du
T02D2865:206b-5: bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rgya cher bsngo'o
T02D2865:206b-6: // 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa'i phyir bdag las
T02D2865:206b-7: kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni
T02D2865:206b-8: // / nam: sa manta badzr'a n'am zhes bya'o //
T02D2865:206b-9: de nas mchod yon dbul te 'di skad brjod pas
T02D2865:206b-10: dpal phyag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa slar
T02D2865:206b-12: gdon mi za bar bdag la yang //
T02D2865:206b-13: rjes su brtse bar dgongs nas ni //
T02D2865:206b-14: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D2865:206b-15: ci bde bar yang gshegs su gsol //
T02D2865:206b-16: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya spyi bor
T02D2865:206b-17: gyen du bkrol sngar dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzhugs
T02D2865:206b-19: mtshams bcad pa yang yid kyis dgrol lo //
T02D2865:206b-20: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas chos kyi
T02D2865:206b-21: dbyings su byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2865:206b-22: sngags dang phyag rgyas las kyi rdo rje sems dpar
T02D2865:206b-24: spyi bor chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ra yig bsam mo //
T02D2865:206b-25: rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas kyang go bgos la
T02D2865:206b-26: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
T02D2865:206b-27: phyag byas nas dge ba'i las bya bar rab tu
T02D2865:206b-29: langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa dge ba'i las ci nus pa bya'o //
T02D2865:206b-30: de nas zas za ba'i tshe na bdag nyid rigs
T02D2865:206b-31: kyi snying pos bsrungs la sngags 'di bzlas la lan
T02D2865:206b-32: gsum btab ste / chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ges
T02D2865:206b-33: sbyangs la zas kyi ro la ma chags par rigs
T02D2865:206b-34: pa dang ldan par ran par bza'o //
T02D2865:206b-36: aom aamri todbha b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2865:206b-37: nyal ba'i tshe na yang rigs kyi yum gyi snying pos bsrungs nas glo g-yas pas nyal lo //
T02D2865:206b-38: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ma nus pas mnyes
T02D2865:206b-39: par bya mi nus so snyam pa'i bsam pa mi
T02D2865:206b-40: bskyed do // dpal dang ldan pa'i skal ldan pas //
T02D2865:206b-41: zhabs la gtugs nas bsdus pa yin //
T02D2865:206b-42: rnam dag lam chen mdzod yin pas //
T02D2865:206b-43: skal ldan byang chub mchog gis spyad //
T02D2865:207a-0: dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad @207a * //
T02D2865:207a-3: // / pandi ta chen po de nyid dang /
